data.text:
Can you name some winglet shapes?

📸 IG @beebrownlow

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond https://t.co/WUuUFOT3bd

Aircraft winglets come in all kinds of shapes. But they share a common purpose. Inspired by the upward curl of feathers on an eagle’s wings 🦅, winglets reduce induced drag in flight and can deliver 3–5% reductions in fuel burn 🔥!
@Wilkinson73Andy Transiting in Hong Kong for any mainland Chinese destinations will be suspended until further notice.
@jglinacre Requirements for transporting dogs via cargo flights and passenger flights will be different. You may DM us if you need further clarifications.

We adjusted our air cargo operations to ship these essential supplies as part of our prioritisation of humanitarian relief efforts.

📸 Instagram dominikbelica, timmboslice_ https://t.co/7zhz6vEFBO

data.text: @YoshaGupta For your information, pets travelling as check-in baggage and/or cargo, will be temporarily unavailable for selected flights. For more details, please visit: https://t.co/dEMcvDeiwT

@phrao60 It will be handled case by case. Yet, if we know the connecting flight will be delayed for more than 24 hours, we would not accept passenger on the first flight, and we will arrange flights on alternative travel date.
@phrao60 Regret that there is no hotel / overnight lounge available inside the restricted area in Hong Kong International Airport.

@phrao60 May we recommend you to contact the destination's immigration department / embassy to check for their entry requirement. If they confirm the passenger is good to go, there will not be an issue with the airline.
@GopalDalvi13 You can direct message us in private message to provide more details.

Q: What are the big white numbers on runways for?
A: They indicate the magnetic azimuth (compass bearing) 🧭 in which the runway is oriented, e.g. “36” represents 360º and “28” represents 280º.

Now, do you know why runway numbers change over time? Give it a guess! https://t.co/c0yVHPL5PD

data.text: *Minimum spend of 5,000 miles per booking. Terms and conditions apply.

urls.title: Miles Plus Cash
urls.description: With Miles Plus Cash—our new payment option for tickets—you can use a mix of Asia Miles and cash payment when booking on our site, starting 30 March.

data.text: "Miles Plus Cash" also provides you with access to more seat options on our flights and those offered by our partner airlines, and allows instant booking confirmations so you can spend more and earn more @AsiaMiles.* https://t.co/Rpi4maMNVd

Miles or cash? Enjoy the flexibility of both
 
Flexible and easy to use, our "Miles Plus Cash" payment option gives you the freedom to choose your seats, flights and destinations. https://t.co/zsCjizw5sy
